document.full_text: wedding photographer denis reggie shot the kennedy-bessette wedding, as well as the nuptials of chelsea clinton, vera wang, emilio estevez, and many others. here's his advice for capturing the big day.
document.title: 7 tips for great wedding pictures
lines_and_colors: wedding photographer denis reggie shot the kennedy-bessette wedding, as well as the nuptials of chelsea clinton, vera wang, emilio estevez, and many others. here's his advice for capturing the big day.
